subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Seton Hall University has reached a settlement in a wrongful termination lawsuit brought by its former men’s basketball coach Bobby Gonzalez, who was fired in March after four seasons with the Pirates.
snippet: Seton Hall University has reached a settlement in a wrongful termination lawsuit brought by its former men’s basketball coach Bobby Gonzalez, who was fired in March after four seasons with the Pirates.
